channel.title: Favorites on Madelyn Kapfhammer
channel.description: Recent content in Favorites on Madelyn Kapfhammer

item.title: Podcasts, Please
item.description: Podcasts are basically taking the world by storm A year ago if someone would have asked me what I knew about podcasts it probably would have gone something like this…

item.title: Some Spotify Recommendations
item.description: It’s kind of like I’ve sold my soul to Spotify Obviously, this isn’t completely true, I do still have a soul, but wow I really do love spotify.

item.title: My Reading List
item.description: A Glimpse Into What I’ve Been Reading When I younger, I spent hours of my life begging my parents to buy me new books to read.
